entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

Application Description

Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Agent Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors of the incident, has been sent to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter. He tracks her to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals. And the curtain rises on this story of daring rescue and grueling horror where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect. Featuring modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline, and vividly detailed graphics, Resident Evil 4 marks the rebirth of an industry juggernaut. entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼šâ‚º39,99 â†’ â‚º19,99 [â‚º19,99 ~ â‚º229,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼šâ‚º19,99

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features youâ€™ll love: â€¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. â€¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. â€¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) â€¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. (Premium) â€¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. Â» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. Â» How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! Â» How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. Â» How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. â€“ TRY PLAYNAV NOW! â€“ Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: â€¢ iOS 15 or higher. â€¢ 3G connection or higher. entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º229,99 â†’ â‚º39,99 [Free ~ â‚º229,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º39,99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. All Price Information

  • Premium Featuresï¼šâ‚º39,99

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features youâ€™ll love: â€¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. â€¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. â€¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) â€¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. (Premium) â€¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. Â» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. Â» How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! Â» How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. Â» How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. â€“ TRY PLAYNAV NOW! â€“ Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: â€¢ iOS 15 or higher. â€¢ 3G connection or higher. Application Description

You are Agent 47 â€” a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, â€œThe Franchiseâ€. Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracyâ€™s lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected. Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic â€” complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support. EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Moneyâ€™s sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs. THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic â€œaccidentsâ€. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff. INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways â€” the hallmarks of a professional assassin. ONE STEP AHEAD An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion. COMPLETE CONTROL Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips. We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money â€” Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues. Supported iPhones: â€¢ iPhone 8 Plus and later â€¢ iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later Supported iPads: â€¢ iPad mini 5 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Air 3 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad 7 (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only â€¢ iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later â€¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com Hitman: Blood Money Â© 2000-2024 IO Interactive A/S. Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies â€“ you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - Ğ¡raft system â€“ get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. Application Description

Drive trains and carry passengers on Japanese railway lines. ãƒ»Simple brain game "Train Dispatcher!2" is a brain game with simple rules. No expertise required. Train fans, game fans, everyone can enjoy it. ãƒ»To everyone who will become a train dispatcher In the morning in Japan, customers are waiting for the arrival of the train to go to work. Let's start the train and transport the customers. ãƒ»Goal of the game Japanese railway companies are for-profit organizations. Let's aim for high operating profit! ãƒ»How to make profit Fare revenue - Departure cost = Operating profit. Fare revenue is generated when passengers board at a station. Example) If two passengers board a train at a station with a fare of 20, the company receives 40. Departure costs are charged according to the number of cars when the train departs. Example) 30 for a 2-car train, 40 for a 4-car train, and 70 for a 10-car train. One person can ride in one car. Fare revenue is generated when customers board the train. Adjust the driving schedule and the number of vehicles to aim for the highest profit. Departure costs. If you run too many trains and the occupancy rate drops, you'll lose revenue. ãƒ»How to operate The game is very easy to operate and the rules are simple. All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time. As the game progresses, various variations such as express trains and transfer stations will appear. ãƒ»Volume Enjoy over 50 routes. Please experience the wide variety of transportation strategies of Japanese railway companies. No ads, no charges. ãƒ»No ads, no billing Please concentrate on the game. Children can also enjoy the game. Share your results on Social Media. ãƒ»Train lines you can play with JR East Japan JR Tokai JR West Japan JR Kyushu Tobu Tokyu Seibu Keio Keikyu Keihan Hankyu Hanshin Kintetsu Meitetsu Odakyu Nankai Seitetsu Sotetsu Keisei Tokyo Metro Osaka Metro Toei Subway Tsukuba Express ãƒ»Capacity is about 130MB The storage burden is also small. There is no heavy processing at all.
